content: this pattern is a smaller version of the adult sizes of the painted canyon cardigan 1 by heart hook home this pattern was completely reformatted and reworked in august 2020 sizes include preemie and newborn sleep sacks 6m 12/18m 2/3t 4/5t 6/8 10/12 if you would like to use a lighter weight yarn such as mandala in valkyrie pictured you may go down a hook size to make a slightly smaller cardigan 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/painted-canyon-hooded-cardigan
